QueryStringImpl

A default implementation of the QueryString protocol that relies on the NSURLComponents class for parsing the underlying query string.

  • queryString

    Returns the query string itself.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let queryString: String
  • init(url:)

    Attempts to initialize a new QueryStringImpl instance using the specified URL.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init?(url: NSURL)

    Parameters

    url

    The URL whose query string will be parsed

    Return Value

    nil if initialization fails

  • init(urlString:)

    Attempts to initialize a new QueryStringImpl instance using the specified URL.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init?(urlString: String)

    Parameters

    urlString

    A string containing a URL whose query string will be parsed.

    Return Value

    nil if initialization fails, such as if urlString contains no query string.

  • firstValueForName(_:)

    Returns the first value for the query string parameter with the given name.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func firstValueForName(name: String)
        -> String?

    Parameters

    name

    The name of the query string parameter whose first value is sought

    Return Value

    The first value in the query string with the name name, or nil if there were no values with the specified name

  • allValuesForName(_:)

    Returns all values associated with the given query string parameter name.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func allValuesForName(name: String)
        -> [String]?

    Parameters

    name

    The name of the query string parameter whose values are sought

    Return Value

    All values in the query string with the name name, or nil if there were no values with the specified name

  • countValuesForName(_:)

    Returns the number of values in existence for the given query string parameter.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func countValuesForName(name: String)
        -> Int

    Parameters

    name

    The name of the query string parameter whose count of values is sought

    Return Value

    The number of values in the query string with the name name
